findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of user funds.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can lead to unauthorized allowance decreases.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is not properly protected, which can lead to unauthorized asset transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy in swapExactETHForTokens function
findings.description: The swapExactETHForTokens function may be vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy in addLiquidityETH function
findings.description: The addLiquidityETH function is vulnerable to potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected setDistributionCriteria function
findings.description: The setDistributionCriteria function is declared as external and only accessible by the owner, but it lacks proper access control or validation, making it vulnerable to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: Unprotected setGasLimit function
findings.description: The setGasLimit function is external and lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify the gas limit.
